thread.title: John Palotta

author: John Palotta
title: John Palotta
text: I needed a microwave oven repaired or replaced in the Greenville, SC area. I found two appliance repair companies on Homeadvisor: Jay & Jay and Red's. I first made an appointment with Jay & Jay. Jay & Jay did not come at the appointment time. I then called Red's for an appointment. When I explained the problem with the microwave oven, Red advised that it would cost less to replace than repair. His advise was good since it cost less to purchase a new oven than the cost of the part. I called Red to install the oven; his charge was $150 to install. I made an appointment, he came on time, and installed the oven within a one hour time.
